mapper.select: select realname from sys_user where id = #{userId}
select exam_id from smart_people where person_id = #{userId}
select IFNULL(exam_grade,-1) as exam_grade from smart_people where exam_id = #{examId} and person_id = #{userId}

SELECT sp.person_name,depart_name as deptName, IFNULL(sp.exam_grade,-1) as exam_grade,is_mark FROM smart_exam_information se LEFT JOIN smart_people sp ON se.id = sp.exam_id LEFT JOIN smart_paper p ON p.id = se.paper_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = sp.person_id LEFT JOIN sys_depart sd on sd.id = u.depart_id WHERE se.paper_id = #{examId} order by exam_grade desc
mapper.update: update smart_people set exam_grade = #{grade},submit_time = #{date} where exam_id = #{examId} and person_id = #{userId}
